products.facts: ["Made with high-quality cocoa for rich chocolate flavor.","Packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","Contains no artificial colors or preservatives, ensuring natural quality.","Produced in facilities that adhere to strict food safety standards."]

products.name: Nutella
products.categories: Breakfasts,Spreads,Sweet spreads,fr:Pâtes à tartiner,Hazelnut spreads,Chocolate spreads,Cocoa and hazelnuts spreads
products.labels: No gluten,No preservatives,No colorings,No hydrogenated fats,Triman,fr:SGS
products.packaging: Composites multicouches,Plastique,Carton,Verre,PP 5 - Polypropylène,Verre transparent,Carton non ondulé,82 C/X,82 C/PAP,en:Bocal
products.facts: ["Nutella contains 7 hazelnuts per 15g serving, contributing to its unique flavor and texture.","The palm oil used in Nutella is sourced from sustainable plantations, aiming to reduce environmental impact.","Nutella is made with high-quality ingredients, including skimmed milk and cocoa, ensuring a creamy and rich taste.","Ferrero, the maker of Nutella, is committed to reducing its carbon footprint and enhancing sustainability in its supply chain."]

products.name: Nutella
products.categories: Breakfasts,Spreads,Sweet spreads,fr:Pâtes à tartiner,Hazelnut spreads,Chocolate spreads,Cocoa and hazelnuts spreads
products.facts: ["Nutella contains sugar, palm oil, hazelnuts, cocoa solids, milk powder, and emulsifiers.","The palm oil used in Nutella is sourced from sustainable plantations to minimize ecological impact.","Nutella is certified by the Rainforest Alliance, ensuring responsible sourcing of its ingredients.","The quality of Nutella is maintained through strict quality control measures during production."]

products.name: Coca Cola Zero
products.labels: Fabriqué en France,Arômes naturels,Sans matière grasse hydrogénée,Triman
products.facts: ["Coca Cola Zero is packaged in a 330 ml aluminum can, which is 100% recyclable.","The can is made from approximately 70% recycled materials, reducing the need for new aluminum production.","Coca Cola Zero contains zero sugar and zero calories, making it a lower-calorie alternative to regular Coca-Cola.","The brand is committed to sustainable sourcing, ensuring that ingredients like caffeine and sweeteners are derived from responsible sources."]

products.name: Le Beurre Tendre Doux
products.labels: Point Vert,Fabriqué en France,Triman,en:Sans additifs,Médaille d'argent du concours général agricole 2009

products.facts: ["Le Beurre Tendre Doux is made from high-quality, pasteurized cow's milk cream.","The product is packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","It is free from artificial preservatives and additives, ensuring natural quality.","Le Beurre Tendre Doux is produced using traditional methods to maintain its rich flavor and texture."]

products.name: Nutella
products.categories: Breakfasts,Spreads,Sweet spreads,fr:Pâtes à tartiner,Hazelnut spreads,Chocolate spreads,Cocoa and hazelnuts spreads
products.labels: No gluten,No preservatives,No colorings,No hydrogenated fats,Triman,fr:Certifié par SGS
products.facts: ["Nutella is made primarily from sugar, palm oil, hazelnuts, cocoa solids, and skimmed milk powder.","The palm oil used in Nutella is sourced from sustainable plantations to minimize deforestation and environmental impact.","Nutella's quality is ensured through strict quality control measures, including the selection of high-quality hazelnuts and cocoa.","Nutella promotes responsible sourcing practices and supports farmers through various sustainability initiatives."]

products.name: Granola

products.labels: Distributor labels,No preservatives,Charte LU Harmony,Made in France,No colorings,Triman,Ble-francais
products.facts: ["Granola typically contains oats, nuts, seeds, and dried fruits, making it a nutrient-dense food option.","Many granola brands use organic ingredients, reducing the environmental impact of pesticide use and promoting sustainable farming practices.","Granola can be a source of healthy fats and fiber, contributing to heart health and digestive wellness.","Some granola products are packaged in recyclable materials, supporting eco-friendly practices and reducing waste."]

products.name: pulpe de tomates
products.labels: Grüner Punkt,Hergestellt in Italien,Metal recycles forever,Nutriscore,Nutriscore Note A
products.facts: ["Pulpe de tomates is made primarily from ripe tomatoes, which are processed to remove skins and seeds.","The production of pulpe de tomates often utilizes sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact.","It is typically packaged in recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendly consumption.","High-quality pulpe de tomates contains no added preservatives or artificial flavors, ensuring a natural taste."]
